transcript: they think I sound smart it sounds smart because it's simple it's present voice it's active not passive the body was carried out of the room we carried the body for its simple defenses so now like have been would have been carried it's just we carried no adverbs usually adverbs are placeholders for shitty verbs we shut the door really hard we slam the door very super way that condenses it down short sentences so simple sentences almost always Max one comma for the most part and whenever you have like two comma like it's like blah blah comma comma and then the thing usually you can just rip it out or reframe it so there's just one sentence and then again the vocab is under third grade ideally fifth grade tops
